text: V Live is a live album by Vitalic released in 2007. The album is an exact recording of Vitalic's live performance in Ancienne Belgique, Brussels. ==Track listing== #"Polkamatic" – 2:05 #"Disco Nouveau (live intro)" – 2:15 #"Bambalec" – 1:57 #"Anatoles" – 4:37 #"Follow the Car" – 4:08 #"Bells" – 5:19 #"The 30000 Feet Club" – 5:35 #"Rhythm in a Box 1 & 2" – 4:44 #"La Rock 01" – 7:43 #Filth n' Dirt - "Go Ahead (Vitalic Garage remix)" – 4:04 #"My Friend Dario" – 3:58 #"No Fun (Play the Guitar Johnny)" – 5:57 #"Fast Lane" – 2:33 #"Valletta Fanfares (live version outro)" - 4:18 ==External links== *Vitalic official website Category:Vitalic albums Category:2007 live albums
title: V Live (album)
